pages.text: $(li)The Crab Shell is an item that can be used to brew a $(l:patchouli:potions/quark/stability)Potion of Stability$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/brewing_stand)$(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/brewing_stand)Brewing Stand$(/l)$(/l).$(br)$(li)$(l:patchouli:creatures/quark/crab)Crabs$(/l) may drop this item upon death.
